value.title: Conditional Formatting with Field Parameters in Power BI???

Patrick and Adam have some ways to get this working.  Matthias K. Question https://youtu.be/ksmNfa_K8GQ?t=1011  Let report readers use field parameters

value.title: Deployment Pipelines give you more CONTROL (Power BI Premium)
value.excerpt: With Deployment Pipelines, you can control your application life cycle stages. Keep content in sync at the different stages of your development. Power BI Premium is required.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/create-reports/deployment-pipelines-overview https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/create-reports/deployment-pipelines-process

value.title: Embedding with Power BI - What's the difference?

We get a lot of questions about what steps need to be taken, what Capacity SKUs are needed and where can they be used. value.title: Expand lists in Power BI (also a look at M Syntax)

value.title: Help your Power BI report users with an Information Panel
value.excerpt: Do your Power BI users understand your report? Chances are, at least not all of it. Help them out with an information panel to help describe the report and understand all of the capabilities. Adam walks you through how to do it in Power BI Desktop!  üì¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Power BI Tutorial | From Flat File To Data Model
value.excerpt: In this Power BI Tutorial, Patrick looks at how to load data from a flat file to the data model. This could be a text, csv or excel file with a lot of columns.
